XenotypeDef.label: Deepweaver moyo
XenotypeDef.description: Medically specialized Moyos that form the elite of the Lighthouse's laboratories. Their bodies are made to test newly synthesized deepblue drugs, and to receive a stronger effect out of the already “perfected” and popularized ones.
XenotypeDef.descriptionShort: Medically specialized Moyos that form the elite of the Lighthouse's laboratories. Their bodies are made to test newly synthesized deepblue drugs, and to receive a stronger effect out of the already “perfected” and popularized ones.
